data.name: plPortalName.Help
data.value: Enter a site title. This title will show up in the Web browser Title Bar and will be a tooltip on the site Logo.

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a description for the site here.

data.name: plKeyWords.Help
data.value: Enter some keywords for your site (separated by commas). These keywords are used by search engines to help index the site.

data.name: plTimeZone.Help
data.value: The TimeZone for the location of the site.

data.name: plGUID.Help
data.value: The globally unique identifier which can be used to identify this site.

data.name: plFooterText.Help
data.value: If supported by the theme this Copyright text is displayed on your site.

data.name: plHomeDirectory.Help
data.value: The location used for the storage of files in this site.

data.name: plLogo.Help
data.value: Depending on the theme chosen, this image will typically appear in the top left corner of the page.

data.name: plFavIcon.Help
data.value: The selected favicon will be applied to all pages in the site.

data.name: plIconSet.Help
data.value: The selected iconset will be applied to all icons on the site.

data.name: SettingsError
data.value: Could not update settings. Please try later.

data.name: SettingsRestoreWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?

data.name: valPortalName.ErrorMessage
data.value: You must provide a title for your site.

data.name: plPageHeadText.Help
data.value: Enter any tags (i.e. META tags) that should be rendered in the "HEAD" tag of the HTML for this page.

data.name: plSplashTabId.Help
data.value: The Splash Page for your site.

data.name: plHomeTabId.Help
data.value: The Home Page for your site.

data.name: plLoginTabId.Help
data.value: The Login Page for your site. Only pages with the Account Login module are listed.

data.name: plUserTabId.Help
data.value: The User Profile Page for your site.

data.name: plRegisterTabId.Help
data.value: The user registration page for your site.

data.name: plSearchTabId.Help
data.value: The search results page for your site.

data.name: pl404TabId.Help
data.value: The 404 Error Page for your site. Users will be redirected to this page if the URL they are navigating to results in a "Page Not Found" error.

data.name: pl500TabId.Help
data.value: The 500 Error Page for your site. Users will be redirected to this page if the URL they are navigating to results in an unexpected error.

data.name: plDisablePrivateMessage.Help
data.value: Select to prevent users from sending messages to specific users or groups. This restriction doesn't apply to Administrators or Super Users.

data.name: plMsgThrottlingInterval.Help
data.value: Enter the number of minutes after which a user can send the next message. Zero indicates no restrictions. This restriction doesn't apply to Administrators or Super Users.

data.name: plMsgRecipientLimit.Help
data.value: Maximum number of recipients allowed in To field. A message sent to a Role is considered as a single recipient.

data.name: plMsgProfanityFilters.Help
data.value: Enable to automatically convert profane (inappropriate) words and phrases into something equivalent. The list is managed on the Host->List->ProfanityFilters and the Admin->List->ProfanityFilters pages.

data.name: plMsgAllowAttachments.Help
data.value: Choose whether attachments can be attached to messages.

data.name: plIncludeAttachments.Help
data.value: Choose whether attachments are to be included with outgoing email.

data.name: plMsgSendEmail.Help
data.value: Select if emails are to be sent to recipients for every message and notification.

data.name: Profile_DefaultVisibility.Help
data.value: Select default profile visibility mode for user profile.

data.name: Profile_DisplayVisibility.Help
data.value: Check this box to display the profile visibility control on the User Profile page.

data.name: redirectOldProfileUrlsLabel.Help
data.value: Check this box to force old style profile URLs to be redirected to custom URLs.

data.name: vanilyUrlPrefixLabel.Help
data.value: Enter a string to use to prefix vanity URLs.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_PropertyName.Help
data.value: Enter a name for the property.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_DataType.Help
data.value: Select the data type for this field.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_PropertyCategory.Help
data.value: Enter the category for this property. This will allow the related properties to be grouped when dislayed to the user.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_Length.Help
data.value: Enter the maximum length for this property. This will only be applicable for specific data types.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_DefaultValue.Help
data.value: Optionally provide a default value for this property.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_ValidationExpression.Help
data.value: You can provide a regular expression to validate the data entered for this property.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_Required.Help
data.value: Set whether this property is required.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_ReadOnly.Help
data.value: Read only profile properties can be edited by the Administrator but are read-only to the user.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_Visible.Help
data.value: Check this box if this property can be viewed and edited by the user or leave it unchecked if it is visible to Administrators only.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_ViewOrder.Help
data.value: Enter a number to determine the view order for this property or leave blank to add.

data.name: ProfilePropertyDefinition_DefaultVisibility.Help
data.value: You can set the default visibility of the profile property. This is the initial value of the visibility and applies if the user does not modify it, when editing their profile.

data.name: Localization.Help
data.value: LOCALIZATION: The next step is to manage the localization of this property. Select the language you want to update, add new text or modify the existing text and then click Update.

data.name: plPropertyHelp.Help
data.value: Enter the Help for this property in the selected language.

data.name: plPropertyName.Help
data.value: Enter the text for the property's name in the selected language.

data.name: plCategoryName.Help
data.value: Enter the text for the category's name in the selected language.

data.name: plPropertyRequired.Help
data.value: Enter the error message to display for this field when the property is Required but not present.

data.name: plPropertyValidation.Help
data.value: Enter the error message to display for this field when the property fails the Regular Expression Validation.

data.name: valPropertyName.ErrorMessage
data.value: You need enter a name for this property.

data.name: PropertyDefinitionDeletedWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this profile field?

data.name: DeleteSuccess.Text
data.value: The profile field has been deleted.

data.name: DeleteError.Text
data.value: Could not delete the profile field. Please try later.

data.name: DuplicateName.Text
data.value: This property already exists. Property names must be unique. Please select a different name for this property.

data.name: RequiredTextBox.Text
data.value: The required length must be an integer greater than or equal to 0. If you use a TextBox field, the required length must be greater than 0.

data.name: portalAliasModeButtonListLabel.Help
data.value: This setting determines how the site responds to URLs which are defined as alias, but are not the default alias. Canonical (the alias URL is handled as a Canonical URL), Redirect (redirects to default alias) or None (no additional action is taken).

data.name: plAutoAddPortalAlias.Help
data.value: This setting determines how the site responds to URLs which are mapped to the site but are not currently in the list of aliases. This setting is effective in single-site configuration only. Select this option to automatically map new URL.

data.name: InvalidAlias.Text
data.value: The site alias is invalid. Please choose a different Site Alias.

data.name: DuplicateAlias.Text
data.value: The Site Alias you specified already exists. Please choose a different Site Alias.

data.name: portalAliasModeButtonListLabel.Help
data.value: This setting determines how the site responds to URLs which are defined as alias, but are not the default alias. Canonical (the alias URL is handled as a Canonical URL), Redirect (redirects to default alias) or None (no additional action is taken).

data.name: plAutoAddPortalAlias.Help
data.value: This setting determines how the site responds to URLs which are mapped to the site but are not currently in the list of aliases. This setting is effective in single-site configuration only. Select this option to automatically map new URL.

data.name: SiteAliasUpdateSuccess.Text
data.value: The site alias has been updated.

data.name: SiteAliasCreateSuccess.Text
data.value: The site alias has been added.

data.name: SiteAliasDeletedWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this site alias?

data.name: SiteAliasDeleteSuccess.Text
data.value: The site alias has been deleted.

data.name: SiteAliasDeleteError.Text
data.value: Could not delete the site alias. Please try later.

data.name: lblIndexWordMaxLength.Help
data.value: Enter the maximum word size to be included in the Index.

data.name: lblIndexWordMinLength.Help
data.value: Enter the minimum word size to be included in the Index.

data.name: valIndexWordMaxLengthRequired.Error
data.value: Maximum length of index word is required. Integer must be greater than the minimum length.

data.name: valIndexWordMinLengthRequired.Error
data.value: Minimum length of index word is required. Integer must be greater than 0.

data.name: lblCustomAnalyzer.Help
data.value: If this is empty, system will use standard analyzer to index content. if you want to use custom analyzer, please type the full name of analyzer class in this field. Note: If you want existing content to index with the new analyzer, you must visit the Admin > Search Admin page of each site that you want re-index and click the "Re-Index Content" button.

data.name: lblAllowLeadingWildcard.Help
data.value: Check this box to return search criteria that occurs within a word rather than only at the beginning of the word. Warning: Enabling wildcard searching may cause performance issues.

data.name: lblAuthorBoost.Help
data.value: Author boost value is associated with the author as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

data.name: lblContentBoost.Help
data.value: Content boost value is associated with the content as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

data.name: lblDescriptionBoost.Help
data.value: Description boost value is associated with the description as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

data.name: lblTagBoost.Help
data.value: Tag boost value is associated with the tag as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

data.name: lblTitleBoost.Help
data.value: Title boost value is associated with the title as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

data.name: lblSearchIndexPath.Help
data.value: Location where Search Index is stored. This location can be manually changed by creating a Host Setting "Search_IndexFolder" in database. It is advised to stop the App Pool prior to making this change. Content from the old folder must be manually copied to new location or a manual re-index must be triggered.

root.data: Custom Analyzer Type The total size of search index database files.

data.name: lblSearchIndexActiveDocuments.Help
data.value: The number of active documents in search index files

data.name: lblSearchIndexDeletedDocuments.Help
data.value: The number of deleted documents in search index files

data.name: lblSearchIndexLastModifiedOn.Help
data.value: Last modified time of search index files.

data.name: MessageIndexWarning.Text
data.value: Compacting or Re-Indexing should be done during non-peak hours as the process can be CPU intensive.

data.name: ReIndexConfirmationMessage.Text
data.value: Re-Index will cause existing content in the Index Store to be deleted. Re-index is done by search crawler(s) and depends on their scheduling frequency. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: CompactIndexConfirmationMessage.Text
data.value: Compacting Index can be CPU consuming and may require twice the space of the current Index Store for processing. Compacting is done by site search crawler and depends on its scheduling frequency. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: SynonymsTagDuplicated.Text
data.value: is already being used in another synonyms group.

data.name: SynonymsGroupUpdateSuccess.Text
data.value: The synonyms group has been updated.

data.name: SynonymsGroupCreateSuccess.Text
data.value: The synonyms group has been added.

data.name: SynonymsGroupDeletedWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this synonyms group?

data.name: SynonymsGroupDeleteSuccess.Text
data.value: The synonyms group has been deleted.

data.name: SynonymsGroupDeleteError.Text
data.value: Could not delete the synonyms group. Please try later.

data.name: IgnoreWordsUpdateSuccess.Text
data.value: The ignore words has been updated.

data.name: IgnoreWordsCreateSuccess.Text
data.value: The ignore words has been added.

data.name: IgnoreWordsDeletedWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the ignore words?

data.name: IgnoreWordsDeleteSuccess.Text
data.value: The ignore words has been deleted.

data.name: IgnoreWordsDeleteError.Text
data.value: Could not delete the ignore words. Please try later.
